main event: A principal observed a bright, oval-shaped object emitting white blinking light in Cut Bank, Montana on August 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 12,000 to 15,000 feet.,The light flashed on and off rapidly at a frequency of 2 to 3 times per second.,The observer noted that the object was high in the sky and appeared to be rotating or revolving.,The sighting lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes before the object suddenly increased speed and disappeared.,Many local people reported seeing the same or a similar object in the following days.
sighted object: a bright oval-shaped object emitting white blinking light
witness description: John Kuchner, the principal of the Cut Bank grade school
